00016  #ifdef BOOST_MSVC
00017 typedef __int64 int64;
00018 typedef unsigned __int64 uint64;
00019  #else

00021 typedef unsigned long long uint64;

00029 // integer types declarations
00030 enum { my_pointer_size = sizeof(void *) };
00031 
00032 template <int PtrSize>
00033 struct choose_int_types
00034 {};
00035 
00036 template <>
00037 struct choose_int_types < 4 >  // for 32-bit processors/compilers
00038 {
00039     typedef int int_type;
00040     typedef unsigned unsigned_type;
00041 };
00042 
00043 template <>
00044 struct choose_int_types < 8 > // for 64-bit processors/compilers
00045 {
00046     typedef long long int int_type;
00047     typedef long long unsigned unsigned_type;
00048 };
00049 
00050 typedef choose_int_types<my_pointer_size>::int_type int_type;
00051 typedef choose_int_types<my_pointer_size>::unsigned_type unsigned_type;
